p.b: The word season has more than one meaning.

questionBody.p: Choose the answer in which season means "to add more flavor to something."

simpleChoice.p: He doesn't know how to play chess now, but I will season my brother by teaching him tricks and strategies. Soon he will be an expert like me.
My favorite season is winter. Dad says he doesn't like it, because he hates to shovel snow and he doesn't like to be cold.
I wanted to buy blueberries at the grocery store, but Dad said they were too expensive. We have to wait until next summer when they are in season.
My little brother hates broccoli. But if we season the vegetables with herbs and spices, he will eat them if my mom asks him to.
